longBusinessSummary: Salona Cotspin Limited produces and sells cotton yarn, knitted fabrics, and garments in India. The company offers ring spin, open end, slub, hank, and compact cotton and blend yarn products. It also provides grey, dyed, and printed fabrics; and knitwear apparels. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
